function NPC_512000:Init( NPCID ) --[[ 1: 날아다니는 시체 갯수 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 1 )
NPC_512000.BufIdFear1 = 40220 -- short NPC_512000.BufIdFear2 = 40221 -- long NPC_512000.BufIdGroundOfDarkness = 40201
NPC_512000.TalIdPain1 = 251200001 NPC_512000.TalIdGroundOfDarkness = 251200020 NPC_512000.TalIdCloakOfFear = 251200022 NPC_512000.TalIdBellOfSummon = 251200007
NPC_512000.NpcIdSkillDummy = 512003 NPC_512000.NpcIdFloatingCorpse = 512004
NPC_512000.LimitForBreakShield = NPC_512000.MaxHP/10 end
function NPC_512000:OnBPartRecover() this:SetUserData( 1, 0) end
-- 소환스킬 전처리 function NPC_512000:SummonFloatingCorpse( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512000:SummonFloatingCorpse\n") if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_512000.TalIdBellOfSummon ) then return end
if ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) < 2 then ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512000.TalIdBellOfSummon ) end end
-- 마법진 위에 있을 때 괴로워하기 function NPC_512000:GainBuff_Pain( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512000:SummonFloatingCorpse\n")
--if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( 251200002 ) then -- return --end --ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 251200002 ) end
-- 부유하는 시체 소환 function NPC_512000:OnFinishBellOfSummon( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor) --GLog( "NPC_512000:OnFinishBellOfSummon\n" )
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), Enemy:GetPos(), vec3( math.random(-300,300) , math.random(-300,300) ,0 ) ) local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_512000.NpcIdFloatingCorpse, WorldPos ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, ThisNPC:GetUserData(1)+1 )
--GLog( "Corpse count = " .. ThisNPC:GetUserData(1) .. "\n" ) end
function NPC_512000:OnFinishBellOfHellFire1( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_512000:SpawnHellFire( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdRushingQuake1 ) end
function NPC_512000:OnFinishBellOfHellFire2( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_512000:SpawnHellFire( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdRushingQuake2 ) end
function NPC_512000:OnFinishBellOfHellFire3( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_512000:SpawnHellFire( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdRushingQuake3 ) end
function NPC_512000:OnFinishBellOfHellFire4( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Minion = NPC_512000:SpawnHellFire( ThisNPC, Enemy ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdRushingQuake4 ) end
function NPC_512000:SpawnHellFire( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), Enemy:GetPos(), vec3(0,0,0) ) return AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( NPC_512000.NpcIdSkillDummy, WorldPos ) end
-- 고통의 대지 마법진 표시 function NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness\n" ) local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( Enemy:GetDir(), Enemy:GetPos(), vec3( math.random(-700,700) , math.random(-700,700) ,0 ) ) local Minion = AsNPC(ThisNPC):SummonNow( NPC_512000.NpcIdSkillDummy, WorldPos ) AsNPC(ThisNPC):SetTarget( Minion ) Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdGroundOfDarkness ) --Minion:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512003.TalIdRealize )
end
-- 고통의 대지 탤런트 콜백 function NPC_512000:OnFinishGroundOfDarkness( ThisNPC, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512000:OnFinishGroundOfDarkness\n") NPC_512000:SpawnGroundOfDarkness(ThisNPC, Enemy) end
-- 전투시작 function NPC_512000:OnCombatBegin( ) --GLog( "NPC_512000:OnCombatBegin\n" ) -- 부유하는 시체 갯수 초기화 this:SetUserData( 1, 0 ) end
--전투종료 function NPC_512000:OnCombatEnd( ) end
function NPC_512000:AccDamage( ThisNPC, PartsIdx, HitInfo ) if not ThisNPC:CheckBuff( NPC_512000.BufIdGroundOfDarkness ) then HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage/20 else HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage/2 --ThisNPC:ClearJob() --ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( 251200001 ) end
--GLog( " D : " .. HitInfo.Damage .. "\n" )
return HitInfo end
function NPC_512000:OnHitCapsule_1_0(HitInfo) return NPC_512000:AccDamage( this, 1, HitInfo ) end
